mapper.select: select CT.*, PF.* from (select c.cart_id, c.member_num, c.pr_number, c.amount, p.pr_name, p.pr_seller, p.pr_price, p.pr_discount, pr_dPrice, (p.pr_dPrice * c.amount) money from cart c, pr p, member m where c.member_num = m.memberNum and c.pr_number = p.pr_number and c.member_num = #{memberNum}) CT left outer join pr_files PF on CT.pr_number = PF.pr_number
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cart_id = #{cart_id} and member_num = #{member_num}
mapper.update: update cart set amount = amount + 1 where cart_id = ${cart_id} and member_num = #{member_num}
update cart set amount = amount - 1 where cart_id = ${cart_id} and member_num = #{member_num}
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(p.pr_dPrice * c.amount),0) from cart c inner join pr p on c.pr_number = p.pr_number where c.member_num = #{member_num}
select ifnull(sum((p.pr_price - p.pr_dPrice) * c.amount),0) from cart c inner join pr p on c.pr_number = p.pr_number where c.member_num = #{member_num}
